name: Scroll To Top
description: Adds an arrow in the bottom right corner of the screen for scrolling back to the top of the current page.

options.description: Animates the return to the top of the page smoothly. Disable this to jump instantly to the top of the page when clicking the scroll to top button.
How far down a page you must be scrolled for the scroll to top button to appear.
The unit to measure the above distance in, e.g. you may wish the button to appear at 90% down any page or only on pages that scroll down further than a certain number of pixels.
